nodes.text: The Sphere of Military Strategy, also known as the Ministry of Military Strategy and the Pyramid of Military Strategy, was one of twelve Spheres of Influence of the reconstituted Sith Empire. Headed by a Dark Councilor, the Sphere was responsible for the strategies and plans that allowed the Spheres of Military Offense and Defense of the Empire to lead the Imperial Military to victory. Darth Azamin was the head of the Sphere during the Great Galactic War, and he was succeeded by Darth Decimus during the Cold War. Darth Marr would inherit Decimus' forces following his defeat on Corellia. Where he commanded the Sphere of Military Strategy alongside his own sphere.
